wiki.summary: "The Writer" is the fifth track on Ellie Goulding's debut album Lights. Goulding told Sky Songs: "The Writer is the most personal and emotional song I've written yet. It's about how you'd do anything and change absolutely EVERYTHING about yourself if necessary, just to be noticed by this one person."

track.name: The Writer
comments: This one is really good. Her voice compliments the music of the song.

not sure whether i love more her voice or her beautiful brown eyes
i can't stop watching it anyway ♥
